/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a gray facade, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and architecture, showcasing the unique charm of Beijing.
